summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The MLK Advisory Board is convening an in-person and online meeting on December 18, 2023, at the Martin Luther King, Jr. Community Center in Dallas, Texas. The meeting aims to discuss preparations for the upcoming MLK Celebration Week and other community initiatives.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
1. Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.
2. Updates on various events planned for the 2024 MLK Celebration Week, including the MLK Parade, Day of Reflection, and Youth Summit.
3. Discussion and voting on the 2024 Community Awards, which include several categories such as Community Service and Humanitarian Awards.
4. Review of the DRAFT 2023 Annual Report, which is due on February 1, 2024.
5. Updates from the MLK Center Manager regarding ongoing programs and services.

**Important Details**:  
Significant proposals include updates on the MLK Celebration Week events, which will take place from January 9 to January 15, 2024. The meeting will also cover the distribution of fresh produce, volunteer opportunities, and legal aid services available at the center. 

**Action Items**:  
The board will seek approval for the minutes from the November meeting and will vote on the 2024 Community Awards. Additionally, members will discuss the DRAFT of the annual report and any necessary adjustments before submission. Public comments will also be welcomed, encouraging community engagement.
